title: Chasing Alpha
description: A naughty, indecent, and delicious short tale with a HEA.Fresh start is about to have a new meaning.Sarah finally has her freedom, in college away from family. The adult life she has been craving is here with her innocence intact.The last thing she is prepared for is literally running into the impossibly hot and sexy Alpha, a twenty-something billionaire. Sarah obliges when Alpha invites her to take his class.What can possibly go wrong with crushing hard on a teacher? It's not like anything is ever going to happen, right?Fireworks fly and a steamy and forbidden romance ensues. Can Alpha and Sarah indulge in their scandalous affair without losing everything?NOTESChasing Alpha is a hot and steamy contemporary romance short story of over 17,000 words, with a happily ever after and no cliffhanger. Oh... and be forewarned, this book is intended for mature audiences.
author: Kaleb Kilton
